The weather-cocke of Romes religion: with her seuerall changes. Or: The world turn'd topsie-turuie by papists Cooke, Alexander, 1564-1632.
[2], 6, 9-16 p.
Printed by George Purslow for Iohn Marriot, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstanes Churchyard in Fleet-streete, London : 1625.
By Alexander Cooke. Running title reads: The Roman weather-cocke. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
